# Team Rules: 

### PR 형식
- [Client] / #88 / edit: readme

### Commit message 형식 - :zap:gitmoji:fire:
- [title] / body
- edit: readme

### Issue 형식
- [title] / body
- Issue Card
> ISSUE
> - Group: 'client', 'sever', 'sr'
> - Type: 'bug', 'feature', 'delete'
> - Detail: fix actions from client redux
>
> TODO
> 1. [] Job1 
> 2. [] Job2 
> 3. [] Job3
> 
> Estimated time
> - Pick one
> '0.5h', '1h', '1.5h', '2h', '2.5h', '3h'
>
> Labels
> - Estimated time: 'E:1h'
> - Group: 'client', 'sever'. 
> - Sprint: 'Sprint_NUMBER__'. 
> - Urgency: 'High', 'Middle', 'Low'. 

### branch 이름 형식 -
 - feat/login

### 변수 이름 - Camel-case
 - clientLogin

### 파일 & 생성자 이름 - Pascal-case
 - ClientSide

### node & npm 버전 통일 
- Node v14.17.3
- NPM v6.14.13

### lint - 
 - recommended
